artist: Designer: Sudō Reiko; Manufacturer: Nuno Corporation
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons and Rosa Lynn Pinkus
description: plain woven off-white ground with dark flecks with supplementary patterns (?); 3 1/4" black and white striped circles; top and bottom machine serged by company for display panel
image_copyright: © Nuno Corporation %2F Striped Rounds%2C Reiko Sudo%2C 2004
text: After this fabric was woven the floating threads that were not connected to the cloth's weave structure were clipped.  The resulting cut ends add a distinctive texture and also reinforce the roundel design element.
title: Striped Rounds
